header.title: Software Engineering Student

about.description: I am a Software Engineering student at Atat√ºrk University. Based on my high motivation and passion for technology, I gain experience in software development by developing projects with languages such as Unreal Engine, C#, C, C++ and Python. With my ability to quickly adapt to new technologies, I am willing to take responsibility in different projects. My goal is to continuously improve my professional skills and build a career where I can provide valuable contributions to the technology sector.
